text: Ra Chapman is an Korean-born Australian film, television and theatre actress. She appeared in Wentworth as Kim Chang.Irish Examiner Neighbours and Wentworth star: Both roles are tough and manipulative Retrieved July 6, 2015 ==Biography== Chapman was born in South Korea and was adopted by Australian parents in 1985.All about Appa … Adoption and Me!
